caption:
Grippy like a 🐐? The @hoka Speedgoat 6, made with cutting-edge Vibram technologies, makes it possible. Developed for unmatched grip and traction, this shoe features the sticky #VibramMegagrip compound and innovative #VibramTractionLug technology, delivering exceptional stability and control even on the toughest terrains. Ascend to the top with control and agility, thanks to the 5mm outsole lug pattern inspired by the hoof of a goat, ensuring a fluid and powerful uphill stride.
 
Running through the trails has never been so fun – words of The Goat.
 
#Vibram #ConfidenceInEveryStep #YourConnectionToEarth
